title: FC Bayern Munich - Wikipedia
snippet: ... Bayern has had 20 coaches since its promotion to the Bundesliga in 1965. Udo Lattek, Giovanni Trapattoni and Ottmar Hitzfeld served two terms as head coach. title: Contract until 2027 | Vincent Kompany named new FC Bayern head coach
snippet: FC Bayern have confirmed Vincent Kompany as their new head coach. The 38-year-old has signed for the record champions through to 30 June 2027.

title: Vincent Kompany - Wikipedia
